thread.title: "Tony, Shelly and the Magic Light" - (barcelona-metropolitan.com)

author: @bcnmetropolitan
title: "Tony, Shelly and the Magic Light" - (barcelona-metropolitan.com)
text:
"Tony, Shelly and the Magic Light"
Childrens' Christmas Film Cycle at CaixaForum
to
[CaixaForum Barcelona](https://www.barcelona-metropolitan.com/locations/caixaforum/)
Av. de Francesc Ferrer i Guàrdia 6-8, 08038 Barcelona
Tony, Shelly and the Magic Light, Filip Posivac (Czeck Republic, 2023)
Tony was born with a special quality: his body glows! However, he spends his time hiding at home under a bunker of blankets, longing to find someone to play with. Just before Christmas, Shelly, a curious little girl, moves into the same building and changes his life completely. Together they embark on an incredible magical adventure, unveiling the hidden mysteries of their building. A film full of light, magic and secrets to discover. Film is dubbed in Catalan.
Recommended for children aged six and up.
At the beginning of each session, CaixaForum's educational team presents the film providing the basic keys to watching and enjoying the film, and invites the attending audience to a family debate after the screening.
For more events check our online
[events calendar](https://www.barcelona-metropolitan.com/search/event/upcoming-events/#page=1).
Christmas in Catalunya
Are you curious about Catalan holiday traditions? Head over to our page
[Christmas in Barcelona](https://www.barcelona-metropolitan.com/whats-on/what-to-do-for-christmas-in-barcelona), and you'll learn about the famous Catalan "pooping log" and the caganer. If you're looking for something Christmassy to do, check out our list of events in and around the city at: [What's on in Barcelona: Christmas](https://www.barcelona-metropolitan.com/search/event/whats-on-in-barcelona-christmas/#page=1).
